title: Snow Patrol
summary: Snow Patrol are a Northern Irish-Scottish rock band formed in 1994 in Dundee, Scotland.[5] They consist of Gary Lightbody (vocals, guitar), Nathan Connolly (guitar, backing vocals), Paul Wilson (bass guitar, backing vocals), Jonny Quinn (drums), and Johnny McDaid (piano, guitar, backing vocals).[6] Initially an indie rock band, the band rose to prominence in the early-mid 2000s as part of the post-Britpop movement.
